remedies.remedy: Tulsi leaves with honey and ginger
remedies.description: How to use: Chew 5-6 fresh tulsi leaves with a teaspoon of honey and a small piece of ginger twice daily. Benefits: Boosts immunity, soothes throat irritation, and reduces coughing.
How to use: Add 3-4 drops of eucalyptus oil to a bowl of hot water, inhale the steam for 5-10 minutes. Benefits: Clears nasal congestion and relieves cough.
How to use: Mix half a teaspoon of turmeric powder in a glass of warm milk and drink before sleep. Benefits: Acts as a natural antibiotic and reduces throat inflammation.
How to use: Take one teaspoon of triphala powder with warm water at bedtime. Benefits: Promotes gentle bowel movements and detoxifies the digestive system.

remedies.remedy: Warm lemon water in the morning
remedies.description: How to use: Squeeze half a lemon into a glass of warm water and drink on an empty stomach. Benefits: Stimulates digestion and helps regularize bowel movements.
How to use: Soak 10-15 raisins overnight in water and eat them on an empty stomach in the morning. Benefits: Acts as a natural laxative and improves stool softness.
How to use: Drink a glass of cold milk without any sugar during acidity attacks. Benefits: Neutralizes excess stomach acid and soothes the stomach lining.

remedies.remedy: Aloe vera juice in the morning
remedies.description: How to use: Drink 2 tablespoons of pure aloe vera juice every morning on an empty stomach. Benefits: Reduces inflammation and balances acid production.
